Version 0.2.1 (2010-07-13)
---------------------------------------
- Repackaging using pybdist.

Version 0.2.0 (2007-12-29)
---------------------------------------
- Plugins can now add their own controls
- Plugins updated:
  - Amazon link, you can put your own associate id.
  - runapp, run any program, passing the clipboard as stdin,  and new clipboard from stdout
  - url2python, convert an url into an easier to understand python snippet.
  - show_python_var, perform a string substitution. 

Version 0.1.0 (2007-03-28)
--------------------------
Initial release
